name: Cube Fighter (Jact)
description:
I had an idea. To create a game which many players can play in one time. And so it's the reason why this prototype is here

 To play just unzip game folder and start CubeFight.exe. Then you need your twitch account. Open the in-game settings and fill your twitch nickname and auth key. (Key style: ouath:dsf4sfafgdsdrg4tresfdfvf7hbdgersf)

Commands:

!join - join the game with your twitch name

!jump - make your cube jump

!target @example - make @example your current target
